overview: A young adult discovers she is pregnant and seeks her mother to share the news.  Her future grandmother, Mrs. Margaretty, is thrilled, but Thalya is apprehensive about the changes that will occur in her life and the responsibility of being a mother.  More experienced, Mrs. Margaretty decides to make a kind of “manual” on how to be a mother.  What lessons will Margaretty pass on to her daughter?  The laughs are guaranteed with the adventures of Marga and her five children: Thalya, Nanda, Ricardo, Rosa and Sabrina
title: Mãe é Tudo Igual
